name: Treasure Diggin' Pirates
description:
Ahoy friends!

How's everyone doing ? Our next adventure will be a dangerous one! 

We'll be diggin' to our hearts content looking to find us a big ol' pile of booty!

But here's the problem, our enemies got here first, they know we want them' loot and will fire everythin' at us!

Try to not kick the bucket and feed the fish while you dig to your hearts content!

Get us the best you can get and we'll be singing chanties all night long!

Controls
  • Use W A S D to move through the island.
  • Use SPACE BAR to dig whenever you're on top of one dig sites.
Items
  • Pirate Hat: Gain double points from all the dig sites for the next 15 seconds.
  • Eye Patch: Gain an overshield that protects you from the canonballs, once you're hit it will go away.
  • Shovel: Digging speed is increased for the next 10 seconds.
  • Parrot: Gain increased movement speed for the next 10 seconds.

This game was made by various Image Campus students

Disclaimer:  Several features (Pirate Character, Music, Sounds) are missing due to our lack of time.
